sentences.en: Additional underutilized industrial space, housing and workers are apparent across town.
sentences.cn: 额外的闲置厂房 、 住宅和工人在这里随处可见.

sentences.en: They had to sell off 10 percent of all underutilized farmland.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不将10%未被充分利用的农田廉价卖掉。

sentences.en: This creates a bottleneck at city hospitals, while smaller hospitals remain underutilized.
sentences.cn: 这令城市医院拥挤不堪,另一面, 小医院也得不到发展.

trans.tran_en: Underutilized is a more formal word for
